name: GovernmentBids.com
tag_list: rfq, rfp, contract, rfi, bid, request-for-proposal, government-rfp, government-rfq, government-contract, government-bids, federal-bidding, state-government-contracts, local-government-contracts, county-rfp, county-bids
overview:
GovernmentBids.com helps businesses seeking to enter or expand into the government

market, providing a source for federal, state and local government RFP, Contract, Bid and Award opportunities.

Through its online service, subscribers obtain direct access to government bids, contract awards and advance information about upcoming opportunities at the local, state, and federal levels, aggregated daily from thousands of sites, numerous government publications and public meeting reports, and supplemented and monitored by a team of government opportunity researchers.

GovernmentBids.com subscribers can create targeted profiles to filter opportunities for their business based on keywords, geography, agency type, product classifications and type of contract.

Targeted government contract opportunities are delivered to subscribers via email daily.
